page.title: 10 Shipton garage
page.content: Mr Jones is the owner of Shipton Garage the garage opens at 8:45 for petrol.Mr Jones opens on Sunday for petrol and car sales.Mr Jones has seven workers,two petrol attendents, two mechanices,one paint sprayer,one store man,one secretary.The garage also sells cigarettes,sweets,car accessories,computer system.The{Ford {Escort}sells best.In June Mr Jones sold 28 cars 10 of the cars were new and the rest were second hand.The most expensive vehicle that Mr Jones has sold is a B.M.W.It cost Â£14000. secretary's main job is to log cars for sale on a computer file and to get the invoice (bill's) from the computer there are two computers one Victor & an Apricot. It takes 2_3 hours for a service at the garage and there is a store room for spare parts.
